name: rocket football challenge
description: A friend of me challenged me to make a game like rocket league.  So here it is. I hope you like it. It is a multiplayer game for 2 people. player 1 can use wasd to move, e to use the rockets and x to get rotation good if you are at your side. player 2 can use k to rotate left, the ";" key to  rotate right, the o key to move forward, the L key to move backwards, i to use the rockets and the "," key to get back to the good rotation. if you want to exit the game you can use the escape key. good luck!
